General.Name: Azevedo & Travassos S.A
General.Description: Azevedo & Travassos S.A. operates as an engineering company in Brazil. The company involves in the heavy construction of airports, highways, and other infrastructure projects. It is also involved in sanitization; pipeline construction; and electromechanical and industrial assembly. In, addition it manufactures cement artifacts; fiber cement; and iron and steel. Further, It is involved in the sale, purchase, and development of real estate. Azevedo & Travassos S.A. was founded in 1922 and is based in São Paulo, Brazil.
General.Address: Rua Vicente Antônio de Oliveira 1050, São Paulo, SP, Brazil, 02955-080
